attributes.action: Allow under 25 year old further education students in England and Wales not to pay their course fees for the second year of their course in 2007/2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chancellor Gordon Brown announced that further education would be free for anyone under 25. Now, students on the second year of their courses are told that they would still have to pay for the second year of their course in 2007/2008 when new joiners can enroll for free.
